data.oai_dc:dc: Marchini et al 2014 BMC EvolBio - Coevolution tibia length and body mass dataset

Data file of artificial selection containing all mice measured from generations F01-F14. Measurements include body mass, tibia length, age at measurement and litter size. Pedigree information is also provided
artificial selection|genetic correlations|lines of least evolutionary resistance|limb body mass allometry|rodent locomotion|pedigree
